text: "MMMBop" is a song by American pop rock group Hanson. It was from their 1997 album Middle of Nowhere. The song hit #1 in several countries, including United States, United Kingdom, Australia, Germany and Mexico. The song was released on April 15, 1997 in the United States. == References == Category:1997 songs Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs Category:Pop songs
title: MMMBop
